thread.title: BRIEF-Civeo Shareholders Approve Share Issuance Proposal For Pending Acquisition Of Noralta Lodge

title: BRIEF-Civeo Shareholders Approve Share Issuance Proposal For Pending Acquisition Of Noralta Lodge

organizations.name: pending acquisition of noralta lodge reuters staff    civeo corp

text:
March 28, 2018 / 3:55 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Civeo Shareholders Approve Share Issuance Proposal For Pending Acquisition Of Noralta Lodge Reuters Staff 
March 28 (Reuters) - Civeo Corp: 
* CIVEO SHAREHOLDERS APPROVE SHARE ISSUANCE PROPOSAL FOR PENDING ACQUISITION OF NORALTA LODGE 
* CIVEO CORP - ‍EXPECTS TO CLOSE ACQUISITION ON OR ABOUT APRIL 2, 2018​ 
* CIVEO CORP - ABOUT 75% OF CO’S SHARES OUTSTANDING WERE VOTED, WITH ABOUT 98% OF VOTES CAST IN FAVOR OF PROPOSAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
